message: I propose we split the $10,000 in a 3:1 ratio, with you receiving $2,500.
I'll give you a fair 40% and take the rest. It's a good deal!
Considering the decrease in value, I propose we divide the $10,000 in a 52.5:47.5 ratio, with you receiving $4,750.
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. It's still a good split!
